product_name: The North Face Diablo Wind Jacket - Men's
long_description: With the cut of a slick, motorcycle jacket, The North Face Diablo Wind Jacket is a protective layer for even the most blustery conditions. Black jacket is polyester taffeta and Camo styles are polyester ripstop; fabrics block wind and feature a durable water repellent finish to shed moisture. Mesh lining enhances airflow and comfort. Hood removes when you don't need it. Reverse-coil center-front zipper is backed with a draft flap. Rib-knit cuffs and hem add comfort and seal in warmth. The North Face Diablo Wind Jacket features zippered hand pockets and an internal media pocket.
short_description: With the cut of a slick, motorcycle jacket, The North Face Diablo Wind Jacket is a protective layer for even the most blustery conditions.
